about_the_game:
This is a VR casual shooting game. Players can wear a helmet, immerse themselves in the virtual reality scene created by the game, and experience shooting interactive games. When entering the game, the player can choose the language mode of the game, and then enter an open field with colorful balloons floating in the air. The player needs to operate the handle to shoot, and can walk around at will. Every time a balloon is broken, a girl will drop. Players need to be close to the girl to catch and score points. If you can't catch it, points will be deducted. Players need to collect 40 points to end the game.

Instructions：
The trigger button on the left and right handles can fire bullets. After breaking the balloon, catching a girl can add 1 point, and if not catching a girl, it is -1 point;
The menu button can call out the menu, the left handle can be interacted, and the trigger button can confirm.

content_descriptors.notes: After the balloon breaks, it will turn into a woman wearing a short skirt and slowly fly down, and you will see the bottom of the skirt when you look up.

If you can't catch it, points will be deducted. Players need to collect 40 points to end the game.

Instructions：

name: VR shooting cute balloons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: This is a VR casual shooting game. Players can wear a helmet, immerse themselves in the virtual reality scene created by the game, and experience shooting interactive games.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
